statements: SELECT * FROM error_circuits;
SELECT circuit_name, circuit_type FROM error_circuits;
SELECT circuit_description, detection_method FROM error_circuits WHERE circuit_type = 'Power';
SELECT circuit_id, circuit_name, correction_method FROM error_circuits WHERE detection_method = 'Automated';
SELECT * FROM error_circuits WHERE circuit_type = 'Network' ORDER BY circuit_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM error_circuits WHERE circuit_type = 'A' ORDER BY circuit_name DESC;
SELECT circuit_name, circuit_description FROM error_circuits WHERE circuit_type = 'B';
SELECT circuit_name, detection_method, correction_method FROM error_circuits WHERE circuit_description LIKE '%error%';
SELECT circuit_name, circuit_description FROM error_circuits WHERE detection_method = 'manual' OR detection_method = 'automatic';
SELECT circuit_name, circuit_description FROM error_circuits WHERE circuit_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM error_detection_circuits;
SELECT circuit_name, circuit_type FROM error_detection_circuits ORDER BY circuit_id DESC;
SELECT circuit_name, circuit_type FROM error_detection_circuits WHERE circuit_type = 'Parallel';
SELECT circuit_name, detection_method FROM error_detection_circuits WHERE circuit_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM error_correction_circuits ORDER BY circuit_name ASC;
SELECT circuit_name, circuit_type, correction_method FROM error_correction_circuits WHERE circuit_type = 'Analog'
SELECT circuit_name, circuit_type FROM error_detection_circuits WHERE circuit_id = 5 ORDER BY circuit_name DESC
SELECT circuit_name, circuit_type, correction_method FROM error_correction_circuits WHERE correction_method LIKE '%parity%'
SELECT * FROM error_detection_circuits WHERE circuit_type = 'Digital' OR circuit_type = 'Analog'
SELECT circuit_name, correction_method FROM error_correction_circuits WHERE circuit_type = 'Analog'
SELECT * FROM ErrorDetectionCircuits;
SELECT circuit_name, circuit_type FROM ErrorCorrectionCircuits ORDER BY circuit_type DESC;
SELECT circuit_name, correction_method FROM ErrorCorrectionCircuits WHERE circuit_type = 'Type A';
SELECT circuit_name FROM ErrorDetectionCircuits WHERE circuit_name LIKE 'Det%';
SELECT circuit_name, circuit_type, detection_method FROM ErrorDetectionCircuits WHERE detection_method IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ErrorDetectionCircuits;
SELECT circuit_name, circuit_type FROM ErrorDetectionCircuits WHERE circuit_type = 'Analog';
SELECT circuit_name, correction_method FROM ErrorCorrectionCircuits WHERE circuit_type = 'Digital' ORDER BY circuit_name DESC;

SELECT c.circuit_name AS detection_circuit, c.circuit_type AS detection_type, r.relationship_id, e.circuit_name AS correction_circuit, e.correction_method FROM ErrorDetectionCircuits c JOIN CircuitRelationship r ON c.circuit_id = r.detection_circuit_id JOIN ErrorCorrectionCircuits e ON r.correction_circuit_id = e.circuit_id;

SELECT r.relationship_id, d.circuit_name AS detection_circuit, c.circuit_name AS correction_circuit FROM CircuitRelationship r JOIN ErrorDetectionCircuits d ON r.detection_circuit_id = d.circuit_id JOIN ErrorCorrectionCircuits c ON r.correction_circuit_id = c.circuit_id WHERE d.circuit_type = 'Analog' OR c.circuit_type = 'Digital';
SELECT id, name, description FROM ErrorDetectionCircuits WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description, id FROM ErrorCorrectionCircuits WHERE name LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM CircuitConnections ORDER BY error_detection_id DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM ErrorDetectionCircuits WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, log_date, log_message FROM CircuitLogs WHERE circuit_id = 3 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CircuitLogs WHERE circuit_id = 10;
SELECT id, name FROM ErrorDetectionCircuits WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description FROM ErrorCorrectionCircuits WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, name, description FROM CircuitConnections ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, log_date, log_message FROM CircuitLogs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM CircuitDetails;
SELECT circuit_name, manufacturer FROM ErrorDetectionCircuits;
SELECT circuit_name, correction_algorithm FROM ErrorCorrectionCircuits ORDER BY circuit_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CircuitConnections WHERE connection_type='Data';
SELECT circuit_name, circuit_type, error_threshold FROM ErrorDetectionCircuits WHERE error_threshold > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM ErrorDetectionCircuits;
SELECT circuit_name, circuit_type FROM ErrorCorrectionCircuits WHERE circuit_id = 3;
SELECT circuit_name, manufacturer FROM CircuitDetails ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT source_circuit_id, destination_circuit_id FROM CircuitConnections WHERE connection_type = 'Serial';
SELECT circuit_id, DATE_FORMAT(log_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date FROM CircuitLogs;
